location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 367: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Chargé d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: In this letter Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, acknowledges the receipt of two despatches from William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Chargé d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, dated 14 and 15 November respectively. Kemball encloses a copy of a communication to Bombay (not included), which he sent upon receiving the despatches. Kemball states that William Taylour Thomson's packet has been sent to Bombay on board the Dwarka, a merchant steamer.
